name: Treasure of jungle
description:
Your character is trying to find a treasure , Help him to avoid obsticles which can hurt him

System requirements :

===============================================

Minimum : 

                Operating System : Windows 7 ( SP1 ) or higher 

                Processer : Intel Core i3 2100

                Ram : 4GB

                Graphics Card : Intel Hd 4000

===============================================

Recommended : 

                Operating System : Windows 7 ( SP1 ) or higher 

                Processer : Intel Core i5 2400

                Ram : 8GB

                Graphics Card :  GTX 750 ti ot GTX 660 ti
